action_function.valueBuilt: async()=>{let a=!1;new Date>=new Date(local.startDate)&&new Date<=new Date(local.endDate)&&(a=!0),await db.m_academic_year.create({data:{name:local.name,is_active:a,start_time:local.startDate,end_time:local.endDate,created_by:user.id,created_date:new Date,id_institution:2}})&&(confirm("Data Saved, Input again?")?(local.name=null,local.startDate=null,local.endDate=null,local.render()):(local.name=null,local.startDate=null,local.endDate=null,local.render(),navigate("/institution/data/academic-years")))};
